members.description: A list of road engines
members.name: Engines

members.description: If true, allows Attribute Conflation to more aggressively rejoin ways with names and specific highway attribution into those with less specific highway attribution and no names.  Enabling this option may result in some false positive road joining.
members.name: Aggressively Join Unmerged Roads

members.description: If true, allows Attribute Conflation to modify the geometry of a reference road layer to accomodate bridge features.  If false, any bridge features represented in the secondary dataset, but not in the reference dataset will be lost.
members.name: Allow Reference Geometry Changes For Bridges

members.description: If true, all reviews outside of the score range established by the configuration options review.score.criterion.max/min.threshold will be removed.
members.name: Allow Reviews By Score

members.description: If true, a building pair has been flagged for review, and one member of the pair is contained completely inside the other, the pair will be matched instead.
members.name: Always atch When One Building Is Completely Contained Inside Another

members.description: Keep building ref geom
members.name: Keep building ref geom

members.description: The threshold at which a match is called a match for buildings. The higher the value, the more strict the matching becomes.
If false, many to many building matches will result in a review. If true, they will all be merged together when matched.
members.name: Automatically Merge Many To Many Matches

members.description: Remove review relations and unmatched features in secondary dataset.
members.name: Conflate Post Ops

members.description: Rounded corners in one dataset can cause non-rounded corners in the secondary dataset to not conflate
members.name: Corner Splitter Rounded Split

members.description: If true, the Duplicate Name Remover will always preserve the original name tag.  Otherwise, it will treat name and alternate name tags equally.
members.name: Preserve Original Name During Duplicate Name Removal

members.description: If true, road conflation merges tag changes into the reference only and makes no geometry changes.
members.name: Tag only merger creator

members.description: If false, when a match found by Building Conflation involves the same feature in a match found by POI to Polygon Conflation, a review will be generated. If true, then that situation will result in a merge between all features involved in the Building and POI to Polygon conflation matches.
members.name: Allow Merges When Conflicts Between Building and POI to Polygon Conflation Occur

members.description: If false, when a match found by Building Conflation involves the same feature in a match found by POI to Polygon Conflation, a review will be generated. If true, then that situation will result in a merge between all features involved in the Building and POI to Polygon conflation matches.
members.name: Automatically Merge Many to One POI to Polygon Conflation Matches

members.description: Determines whether the reader used by the conflate command to read the first input dataset will use the element ID's specified by the input datasets (true) or use internal ID management for the inputs (false).
members.name: Use Ref IDs During Conflation

members.description: If set to true and multiple criterion are specified in remove.elements.visitor.element.criteria, elements will be removed only if they satisfy all of the criteria.  If set to false, then only one of the specified criteria must be met in order to remove an element.
members.name: Chain Together Criteria When Removing Elements

members.description: The criteria for the RemoveElementsVisitor above
members.name: Remove Elements Visitor Criteria

members.description: Remove elements recusively
members.name: Remove elements recusively

members.description: If true, reviews outside of the score range specified by review.score.criterion.min/max.threshold will pass the filter.
members.name: Invert Review Score Thresholding

members.description: The score threshold above which reviews will not pass the filter.  A value of 1.0 signifies no maximum score threshold.  This currently works with Attribute Conflation only and can be enabled with attribute.conflation.allow.reviews.by.score.
members.name: Review Score Maximum Threshold

members.description: The score threshold above which reviews will not pass the filter.  A value of 1.0 signifies no maximum score threshold.  This currently works with Attribute Conflation only and can be enabled with attribute.conflation.allow.reviews.by.score.
members.name: Review Score Minimum Threshold

members.description: Tag keys that TagKeyCriterion uses to filter elements.
members.name: Tag Key Criterion Keys

members.description: The tag merging strategy to use
members.name: Tag Merger

members.description: The way joiner to use to rejoin ways split during cleaning and conflation matching
members.name: WayJoiner

members.description: When true, writers will include circular error information. Not honored by all writers.
members.name: Export Circular Error Tags
